mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO FRME_IMG_DAY_STATS ( STATS_DTTM , ADVER_ID , ALGM_SEQ , PLTFOM_TP_CODE , ADVRTS_PRDT_CODE , ADVRTS_TP_CODE , ITL_TP_CODE , BNR_CODE , FRME_SIZE , IMG_TP_CODE , CATE1_SEQ , SESS_ORDER_CNT, SESS_ORDER_AMT, SESS2_ORDER_CNT, SESS2_ORDER_AMT, DIRECT_ORDER_CNT, DIRECT_ORDER_AMT, PAR_EPRS_CNT , PAR_EPRS_CNT_D, CLICK_CNT , ADVRTS_AMT , ORDER_AMT , ORDER_CNT , REG_USER_ID, REG_DTTM, ALT_USER_ID, ALT_DTTM ) VALUES
( ${I.yyyymmdd}, #{I.userId}, #{I.matrAlgmSeq}, #{I.platform}, #{I.product}, #{I.advrtsTpCode}, #{I.interlock}, #{I.bnrCode}, #{I.frameSize}, #{I.imgTpCode}, #{I.cate1}, #{I.sessionOrderCnt}, #{I.sessionOrderAmt}, #{I.browserSessionOrderCnt}, #{I.browserSessionOrderAmt}, #{I.directOrderCnt}, #{I.directOrderAmt}, #{I.viewCnt3}, #{I.divisionViewCnt}, #{I.clickCnt}, #{I.point}, #{I.price}, #{I.orderCnt}, 'BATCH', NOW(), NULL , NULL )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE PAR_EPRS_CNT = PAR_EPRS_CNT+VALUES(PAR_EPRS_CNT), PAR_EPRS_CNT_D = PAR_EPRS_CNT_D + VALUES(PAR_EPRS_CNT_D), CLICK_CNT = CLICK_CNT+VALUES(CLICK_CNT), ADVRTS_AMT = ADVRTS_AMT+VALUES(ADVRTS_AMT), ORDER_AMT = ORDER_AMT+VALUES(ORDER_AMT), ORDER_CNT = ORDER_CNT+VALUES(ORDER_CNT), SESS_ORDER_CNT =SESS_ORDER_CNT + VALUES(SESS_ORDER_CNT), SESS_ORDER_AMT = SESS_ORDER_AMT + VALUES(SESS_ORDER_AMT), SESS2_ORDER_CNT =SESS2_ORDER_CNT + VALUES(SESS2_ORDER_CNT), SESS2_ORDER_AMT = SESS2_ORDER_AMT + VALUES(SESS2_ORDER_AMT), DIRECT_ORDER_CNT =DIRECT_ORDER_CNT + VALUES(DIRECT_ORDER_CNT), DIRECT_ORDER_AMT =DIRECT_ORDER_AMT + VALUES(DIRECT_ORDER_AMT), ALT_USER_ID = 'BATCH', ALT_DTTM = NOW()

INSERT INTO BILLING.FRME_ACTION_LOG ( STATS_DTTM, IP, PRODUCT, ADVRTS_TP_CODE, SITE_CODE, PAR_NO, ADVER_ID , MEDIA_ID , ALGM_SEQ, IMG_TP_CODE, CATE1_SEQ ) VALUES
( ${I.yyyymmdd}, #{I.ip}, #{I.product}, #{I.advrtsTpCode}, #{I.siteCode}, #{I.mediaCode}, #{I.userId}, #{I.scriptUserId}, #{I.frameSelector}, #{I.imgTpCode}, #{I.cate1} )
